sentences.en: After leaving the chapel the Czar inspected the chapter library.
sentences.cn: 离开教堂后,沙皇参观了教堂图书馆.

sentences.en: Carol was sorry to hear that the Czar was coming back.
sentences.cn: 卡罗尔一听说沙皇要卷土重来,心里很难受.

sentences.en: He had become czar through regicide.
sentences.cn: 他通过弑君登上了沙皇宝座。

sentences.en: He promised to appoint an AIDS czar to deal with the disease.
sentences.cn: 他许诺任命一位艾滋病大使来应对这种疾病。

sentences.en: In return, the Czar gave the king of Prussia 55 of his best soldiers.
sentences.cn: 作为回赠, 沙皇把他55名最好的士兵送给了普鲁士国王.

sentences.en: The czar banished him to Siberia.
sentences.cn: 沙皇曾将他流放到西伯利亚.

sentences.en: The Czar of Russia was overthrown in 1917.
sentences.cn: 俄国沙皇一九一七年被推翻.

sentences.en: The czar ordered the guards to drive people away.
sentences.cn: 沙皇命令卫兵把人们赶走.

sentences.en: The Jews didn't like Czar, and they didn't want Russia to win this war.
sentences.cn: 犹太人不喜欢沙皇, 他们不想俄国赢得这场战争.

sentences.en: The key was creating the post of quality - controlled czar , something Hyundai never had before.
sentences.cn: 关键是制定出现代公司前所未有的质量管理权威标准.

sentences.en: Well, if he were the Czar of Russia mong his subjects, it might be natural.
sentences.cn: 如果他是处在其臣民中的俄国沙皇, 那倒并不奇怪.

words.tran_cn: 沙皇的；俄国帝制的；专制的

trans.tran_cn: （帝俄的）皇帝，沙皇，独裁者，独揽大权者
